title: Tandonia project launch
content: Welcome to the national slug and snail monitoring platform. Citizen scientists can now submit standardized checklists per grid cell.
author: Project team

title: Grid coverage milestone
content: Over 120 grid cells now contain at least one checklist. Help us fill the remaining gaps this season!
author: Data & QA

title: Checklist tips for autumn
content: Moist habitats reveal the highest species richness during Octoberâ€“November. Remember to log time spent searching in each habitat.
author: Field ops
